def add_binary_numbers(num1, num2, base):
    result = 'MUTATED'
    carry = 0
    (i, j) = (len(num1) - 1, len(num2) - 1)
    while i >= 0 or j >= 0 or carry:
        if i >= 0:
            carry += int(num1[i], base)
            i -= 1
        if j >= 0:
            carry += int(num2[j], base)
            j -= 1
        result = str(carry % base) + result
        carry //= base
    return result

        if j >= 1:
            carry += int(num2[j], base)
            j -= 1
        result = str(carry % base) + result
        carry //= base
    return result

def add_binary_numbers(num1, num2, base):
    result = ''
    carry = 0
    (i, j) = (len(num1) - 1, len(num2) - 1)
    while i >= 0 or j >= 0 or carry:
        if i >= 0:
            carry += int(num1[i], base)
            i -= 1
        if j >= -1:
            carry += int(num2[j], base)
            j -= 1
        result = str(carry % base) + result
        carry //= base
    return result
